Dialogue.text: You already know the basics. Let's get started then!

Dialogue320.text: In order for us to help the community to fight the unknown enemy, we will need your assistance.

Dialogue328.text: We need to extract information related to CX-6 virus with the help of our new technology, Gnar.

Dialogue336.text: The difficulty of extracting information depends on how infected the subject is. As of now, we don't know yet how to classify the magnitude of the infection. Maybe after we conduct a number of extractions, we will come up a new data.

Dialogue352.text:
Reminders:
1, Gnar provides amount of extraction ammo, 60 to be exact, that gives health fragments after each battle. Be sure to hit the virus with all of the given ammo.

Dialogue360.text: 2. Gnar provides 3 anti-virus layers that will keep us safe during the extraction process. Better dodge the particles as you can!

Dialogue368.text: 3. Gnar will only last for 30 seconds. Be sure to stay alive until the last second to utilize our new technology.

Dialogue376.text: If you forget something, feel free to ask me again. Good luck to us!

Dialogue868.text: Hello there! Welcome to the Lab!
